lead_paragraph: Three years ago today Prime Minister Chamberlain was telling cheering crowds in Downing Street that he had "returned from Germany, bringing peace with honor." He had joined with Hitler in a solemn statement that "we regard the agreement signed last night and the Anglo-German naval agreement as symbolic of the desire of our two peoples never to go to war with one another again."
